HERO_SUBTITLE: Increase sales, orders, & maximize profits. Try our personalized ordering system and experience the best direct online ordering service for your restaurant #FoxExperience.
FIRST_BENEFIT: Get more orders with our tools
WHY_FOX_SUBTITLE: The best direct online ordering service
WHY_FOX_1_TEXT: We’re here to help your business grow and maximize profits. Our small convenience fee is 5% over subtotal order value.
WHY_FOX_2_TEXT: There’s no strings attached with us! Enjoy our benefits for as long as you like.
WHY_FOX_3_TEXT: Allow your customers to order directly from your website, browse your menu, and access promotional discounts.
WHY_FOX_4_TEXT: Our system is user-friendly and easy to navigate. We provide training and support to help you get started.

WHAT_WE_OFFER.HERO_SUBTITLE: Your business is our top priority
WHAT_WE_OFFER.HERO_TEXT: We’re here to help your business grow and maximize profits. Our small convenience fee is 5% over the subtotal order value, however this fee can be paid by your customers.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.PERFECT_TECHMATE_TEXT: Increase orders and build customer loyalty with our easy-to-use online ordering service. Watch your profits grow while your customers keep coming back for more.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.PERSONALIZED_WEBSITE_SUBTITLE: Get your exclusive restaurant website for free!
WHAT_WE_OFFER.PERSONALIZED_WEBSITE_TEXT: Let your customers easily browse your menu, enjoy exclusive discounts, and place orders directly, and safely.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.CAPITAL_TITLE: Fox Ordering opens the door to easy and hassle-free restaurant funding.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.CAPITAL_TEXT: Let your customers easily browse your menu, enjoy exclusive discounts, and place orders directly, and safely.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.FTR_TEXT: Find in one place, the restaurants affiliated with our service. Here, customers can order directly from our clients.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.FTR_LIST_ITEM_1: Personalized experience: Simple payments, finding locations, or checking an order status has never been easier.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.FTR_LIST_ITEM_2: Online presence: Improve the positioning of your restaurant online and reach a growing audience.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.FTR_LIST_ITEM_3: Customer Engagement: The power of an app will enhance customer loyalty. Offer this benefit to your customers, whether they use iOS or Android.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.FTR_LIST_ITEM_4: Digital Transformation: Develop and evolve your business. The use of technology in your restaurant will always differentiate your service.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.BRANDED_APP_SUBTITLE: Our team will build, optimize, and maintain your branded app, ensuring a seamless experience for both you and your customers.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.BRANDED_APP_TEXT: Let your customers easily browse your menu, enjoy exclusive discounts, and place orders directly, and safely.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.FOX_PUSH_TITLE: Elevate customer loyalty with our automated Email and SMS marketing solutions.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.FOX_PUSH_TEXT: Encourage repeat orders, drive sales, and ensure your guests keep returning for more!
WHAT_WE_OFFER.CALL_RELAY_SUBTITLE: Effortlessly manage phone orders and customer inquiries with our call relay service.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.CALL_RELAY_TEXT: With SMS integration, we share your menu and guide them through the easy online ordering process on your website.

ABOUT_US.HERO_TEXT: We are passionate about good ideas, purposeful living, and team impact.Your business is in expert hands; choosing the best direct online ordering service is a game-changer you'll cheer for. Ready to play and win big with us? Let's make success the Fox Pack way!
ABOUT_US.TEAM_TEXT_1: Born in 2014, Fox Ordering is a tech company with a mission to transform the online ordering experience for restaurants and their customers. We believe every restaurant, regardless of size, deserves access to affordable and effective online ordering solutions.
ABOUT_US.TEAM_TEXT_2: We have been driven by the desire to empower restaurants with the tools they need to succeed in the digital age. We understand that online ordering is not just about taking orders; it's about building relationships, increasing customer loyalty, and driving sales growth.
ABOUT_US.TEAM_TEXT_3: Fox Ordering stands out by prioritizing the success of our restaurant partners. We're not just a platform; we're a team of dedicated professionals committed to helping restaurants thrive in the digital era.
ABOUT_US.TEAM_TEXT_4: With over 5,000 restaurants across the United States, we've witnessed firsthand the transformative power of online ordering. Our platform has helped restaurants increase their sales, expand their customer base, and streamline their operations.
ABOUT_US.TEAM_TEXT_5: Ready to experience the Fox Ordering difference? Contact us today and let us show you how we can help you transform your online ordering experience.
ABOUT_US.JOIN_OUR_TEAM_TEXT: This is the call for all creative, audacious and outgoing spirits

GOOGLE_THIRD_PARTY_DISCLOSURE.TITLE: Work with third parties
GOOGLE_THIRD_PARTY_DISCLOSURE.SUBTITLE_3: How to work with a third party
GOOGLE_THIRD_PARTY_DISCLOSURE.SUBTITLE_5: Report a violation of third-party policy
GOOGLE_THIRD_PARTY_DISCLOSURE.TEXT_1: Google Business Profile makes it easy for customers to find and connect with your business when using Google Search and Maps. When you create and verify a Business Profile, you can manage how your business appears on Google to make a great first impression and keep your info up-to-date. As people find you on Google, you’ll gain insights on customer behavior and learn how they’re discovering and interacting with your business.
GOOGLE_THIRD_PARTY_DISCLOSURE.TEXT_2: Business Profile gives you tools that can help your business succeed, but sometimes running a enough time to establish and maintain a successful Business Profile. If you need a helping hand or want some advice choose to work with a third party. There are many third parties to choose from, ranging from large companies that manage hundreds of customers to individual web consultants.
GOOGLE_THIRD_PARTY_DISCLOSURE.TEXT_3: Although Business Profile is a tool that can be used at no charge, third parties often charge a fee to manage your profile. They can provide valuable services like keeping your profile up-to-date, providing you with customer insights, answering your questions, and responding to reviews. It’s important to understand the benefits that you may be get from a third party so that you can evaluate whether or not you’re getting the best return on your investment.
GOOGLE_THIRD_PARTY_DISCLOSURE.TEXT_4: Here are five best practices for selecting and working with a third party:
GOOGLE_THIRD_PARTY_DISCLOSURE.TEXT_5:
1. Be selective. Ask these questions when selecting a third party to work with:
    • Has it managed Business Profiles before?
    • Has it managed businesses with similar budgets or target audiences?
    • What other services can it provide to grow your business?
  2. Work with one at a time. You may be tempted to divide your budget among multiple third parties to see which one drives the best results, but keep in mind that it’s best to test them one at a time. Your business can only appear once on Google, so it’s difficult to test multiple third parties at once.
  3. Educate yourself. It doesn’t take much time to get up to speed with how Business Profile works and understand how to use its features. Review the resources and FAQs for a basic introduction to Business Profile, then explore the Help Center to find answers to specific questions. Understanding how Business Profile works will help you make more informed decisions when working with a third party.
  4. Trust experience. Companies that have managed hundreds of businesses on Google are more likely to have expertise with Business Profile. Before you hire a third party, talk to its staff members to understand their previous experience managing businesses on Google.
  5. Evaluate your performance. You can find a wide range of insights in your Business Profile account that can give you info about how customers are finding and interacting with your business on Google. Spend time each month reviewing your profile's performance and evaluating the results you’re getting from working with a third party. Check for things like updated photos and current business hours, as well as changes in how customers are discovering your business online.
GOOGLE_THIRD_PARTY_DISCLOSURE.TEXT_6: Many third parties represent the best interests of their clients, but some third parties are reputable Here’s a list of red flags to watch out for when selecting and working a third party:
GOOGLE_THIRD_PARTY_DISCLOSURE.TEXT_7:
• Not being transparent. You have a right to know how users are interacting with your business, including specific data (like the number of views and clicks on your Business Profile).
  • Guaranteeing placement on Google. It's not possible for third parties to influence the order in which your business appears on Google Search or Maps. Learn more about local search ranking.
  • Claiming to work for Google. If a third party representative claims to be employed by Google, ask for their name and request that they email you from their @google.com (not @gmail.com) email address.
  • Making threats. Third parties can’t remove your business from Google or access your profile without your explicit permission.
  • Deceptive pricing. Malicious third parties may not charge you using the pricing you agreed to. Always get an official copy of your agreement before working with a third party.
GOOGLE_THIRD_PARTY_DISCLOSURE.TEXT_8: Think a third-party partner is violating the policy? Let us know: Report a violation of third-party policy.
GOOGLE_THIRD_PARTY_DISCLOSURE.TEXT_9: While we may not respond personally when you contact us about a third party, we will investigate your comments and, if necessary, take appropriate action.

FAQ.TITLE:
Frequently Asked
Questions
FAQ.QUESTION_1: How much is Fox Ordering convenience fee?
FAQ.ANSWER_1: Fox Ordering convenience fee is 5% over subtotal order value
FAQ.QUESTION_2: Do I need to pay for my tablet?
FAQ.ANSWER_2: No, tablets are included as part of our service.
FAQ.QUESTION_3: When do I receive my tablet?
FAQ.QUESTION_4: Who takes care of my deliveries?
FAQ.ANSWER_4: Our delivery partner is Doordash, they will be in charge of delivering orders to the final customer.
FAQ.QUESTION_5: Who should I talk to if I have an issue with a driver?
FAQ.ANSWER_5_1: Doordash support information can be found in the View order section; then under Options/Cancel, it is the fourth tab from the top: Help.
FAQ.ANSWER_5_3: Call DoorDash Support (855) 431-0459, explain your case and ask for a full refund. IMPORTANT: DoorDash should send you a confirmation email to the restaurant's email.
FAQ.ANSWER_5_4: Forward the received email to support@foxordering.com
FAQ.ANSWER_5_5: Call our support number (866) 883 6967 and explain the case. One of our agents will contact you to manage the refund to your customer and confirm the payment of the prepared order.
FAQ.ANSWER_5_6: In no case should the restaurant refund in cash. The customer will receive a refund to the same payment method used when ordering online, within up to 5 business days.
FAQ.QUESTION_6: Do I get a printer sent to me?
FAQ.ANSWER_6_1: We don't deliver printers, however the printer that works with our tablet and service can be purchased on amazon at the following link
FAQ.QUESTION_7: How often do I get paid?
FAQ.ANSWER_7: Direct deposits are sent out weekly, every Thursday. Direct deposits should be available between 1-3 business days.
FAQ.QUESTION_8: Does Fox Ordering work as a Marketplace?
FAQ.ANSWER_8: We don't operate as a marketplace. Fox Ordering functions as a direct online ordering system, covering both Pick up and Delivery. We operate through the restaurant's official website, and in cases where a restaurant lacks a website, we offer to create one at no cost. This streamlined process is facilitated by the Google My Business profile, serving as a beneficial ally for Fox Ordering.
